ComicInfo.Title: A Fake Cracked Ad; Cracked interviews Stephen Kink the Horror King!; Don't Even Start!!!; Monster Combination Movies; Gorbachev in America; Polter-Psycho-Geist; The Cracked List of Stupid Things That Only Kids Like!; Robot Gun; Horror Tales for the 80's; The Lovesick Connection; Monstrous Practical Jokes!; Nightmare; Real Life Horror!; Rock, Rattle & Moan!; Painting the Town
ComicInfo.Summary:
A robot uses a gun against his enemies but the gun turns into another robot and destroys him.
Hudd and Dini have a nightmare about monsters. When the guard wakes them up they're very grateful.
